paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted pathogenic variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from a study on Moroccan patients with hereditary breast and ovarian cancer syndrome.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: From the 18 patients with pathogenic variants in BRAC1/2 genes in our study; twelve had breast cancer, five had ovarian cancer and one had both breast and ovarian cancer.

functional_data.summary: The variant leads to a frameshift and a premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on classification as pathogenic.
variants.additional_notes: This variant has been reported in both BIC and Clinvar.
key_quotes: In BRCA2 gene we detected 6 different pathogenic variants as well.
